title: Unitarity of supersymmetric SL(2,R)/U(1) and no-ghost theorem for fermionic strings in AdS(3) x N
abstract: The unitarity of the NS supersymmetric coset SL(2,R)/U(1) is studied for the discrete representations. The results are applied to the proof of the no-ghost theorem for fermionic strings in AdS(3) x N in the NS sector. A no-ghost theorem is proved for states in flowed discrete representations.
